category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Mci0ExtractPatternPMI
preference.preference_description: Specifies if all of the Product Manufacturing Information (PMI) in a pattern should be imported. Valid Values: * "true": all the PMIs mentioned in the pattern are imported. * "false": only one PMI of the pattern is imported. This is the default value.
